name: ld46 - Keep town alive
description:
BEWARE: The web version has some wierd scaling issues and some UI elements are missing. Use it just to get a taste, for full experience download the windows version. Sorry :(.

You need to keep the population alive by DISINFECTING the houses. But beware, you must disinfect quickly before more population catch the virus!

Challenge yourself and try to reach the highest level!

Control with WASD + mouse + LMB

Playtime ~5-15 min. Average level reached is 10.
